message: Let's get this started! I'll give you $100000 to get us off the ground. What do you say?
I'll give you a decent chunk, but I'm not going for a lowball offer right off the bat.
I'll give you a bit more this time. Let's meet in the middle and see if we can make a deal.
You're getting closer, but I still think I deserve more. I'm willing to compromise, but not too much.
I'm getting closer to your end, Bob. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give away all the low-hanging fruit.
You're getting closer to my end, but I'm still not convinced. I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting off that easy!
I'm not going to give up yet! Let's meet exactly in the middle and see if we can finally make a deal.
